response.original_title: Joz Norris - The Incredible Joz Norris Locks Himself Inside His Own Show, Then Escapes, Against All the Odds
response.overview: Anecdotal absurdity at it’s finest, Joz’s surreal stories are interwoven warmly together into a web of joyful silliness. Literature, a tumultuous upbringing and skeletons in the closet all get an airing in this mesmerisingly off-beat show.
response.title: Joz Norris - The Incredible Joz Norris Locks Himself Inside His Own Show, Then Escapes, Against All the Odds
